text: Professor François Diederich (9 July 1952 – 23 September 2020) was a Luxembourgian chemist. His works focused in organic chemistry. Diederich was born in Ettelbruck, Luxembourg. In 1992 he was appointed Professor of Organic Chemistry at ETH Zurich. He retired on July 31, 2017. He was a member of the American Academy of Arts and Sciences and National Academy of Sciences. Diederich died on 23 September 2020 from cancer, aged 68.Chemiker François Diederich verstorben ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Luxembourgian scientists Category:Chemists Category:Luxembourgian educators
title: François Diederich
